name: PixelWorld (Spacefudge)
description:
PixelWorld is a pixel-art action RPG in a procedurally generated fantasy world. Explore the open world encountering randomly generated quests, fast-paced combat, loot, pets and more.

Features
  • CUSTOMIZATION: Name and design your character from 5 different fantasy species
  • COMBAT: Fast-paced combat with dodging, different weapon types, and charged/mana ability
  • NPC'S: Procedurally generated characters 
    • QUEST'S: Quest givers offer item gathering quests with a sweet reward
    • MERCHANT'S: Depending on the merchant type a wide selection of armor, weapons, and food can be purchased for the right amount of coin. Loot from merchants should scale with you
  • INFINITE WORLD: Explore an endless procedural world to find all the secrets it hides
  • PETS: Tame any animal with their favourite pet food to gain a companion that will fight for you
